info.name: DTR SMART App Tests Postman Demo
info.description:
The variables tab in this collection controls port for inferno and token used to establish a session.

- url_prefix: points to a running instance of inferno. Typical values will be
    
    - Inferno production: [https://inferno.healthit.gov/suites](https://inferno.healthit.gov/suites)
        
    - Inferno QA: [https://inferno-qa.healthit.gov/suites](https://inferno-qa.healthit.gov/suites)
        
    - Local docker: [http://localhost](http://localhost)
        
    - Local development: [http://localhost:4657](http://localhost:4657)
        
- jwt_with_inferno_client_id: a non-standard jwt with the client_id value for the test present in the "inferno_client_id" entry of the payload. See [https://jwt.io/#debugger-io?token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpbmZlcm5vX2NsaWVudF9pZCI6InRlc3QifQ.VvPENMXJqEfG3ShJ4hp4MQblfxcwJuX5o-3wSrGXEi0](https://jwt.io/#debugger-io?token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpbmZlcm5vX2NsaWVudF9pZCI6InRlc3QifQ.VvPENMXJqEfG3ShJ4hp4MQblfxcwJuX5o-3wSrGXEi0) for an example where the client id is `sample` (NOTE: no other details matter). Sent on all questionnaire and clinical requests in the Authorization header as a bearer token (Bearer {{jwt_with_inferno_client_id}} - configured on the Authorization tab).
